references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Latent Diffusion Model, a foundational model for high-quality image generation that is leveraged by LayerTracer.

references.paper_title: Differentiable vector graphics rasterization for editing and learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Diffvg, a differentiable rendering method for vectorization, which provides the core technique used by LayerTracer for vectorizing rasterized outputs.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: LayerTracer uses LoRA for efficient fine-tuning of the pre-trained diffusion model, making this a crucial technique.

references.paper_title: Vectorfusion: Text-to-SVG by abstracting pixel-based diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is a related work in text-to-SVG synthesis, providing a comparison baseline for LayerTracer.
This paper introduces the Diffusion Transformer (DiT) model, which forms the architecture foundation of LayerTracer.
